tiaraFrMib.name: tiaraFrMib

revisions.description: Initial version of this MIB module.

tiaraFrMib.contactinfo: Tiara Networks Customer Support 525 Race Street, Suite 100, San Jose, CA 95126 USA Tel: +1 408-216-4700 Fax: +1 408-216-4701 E-mail: support@tiaranetworks.com
tiaraFrMib.description: This file contains Tiara Network Inc. specific MIB module for Frame Relay implementation.

frTable.name: frTable
frTable.description: A list of a Frame Relay interface configuration parameters. The table contains parameters for both the uni and multi link frame-relay interface.

frTableEntry.name: frTableEntry
frTableEntry.description: An entry in the frTable. The bundle Id forms the index into the table.

frIfEnable.name: frIfEnable
frIfEnable.description: Enables or disables the frame-relay interface. By default frame- relay interface is enabled. Writing zero (0) disables frame-relay interface.

frEnablePvcAll.name: frEnablePvcAll
frEnablePvcAll.description: Enables all PVCs related to the interface. By default all PVCs related to an interface are disabled. Writing One (1) enables all PVCs at the same time for an interface indexed by bundleId.

frFrameSize.name: frFrameSize
frFrameSize.description: Maximum Size of the frame that will be configured for this Frame Relay interface. The value for frame size ranges from 56 to 4096 bytes, with a default value of 1600 bytes.

frIfType.name: frIfType
frIfType.description: Indicates the interface type for the frame-relay interface.

frLmiType.name: frLmiType
frLmiType.description: Local management Interface type for the frame-relay interface. It can take any of the following three values: ansi - ANSI T1.617 (Annex D), cisco - Cisco LMI, q933a - ITU-T Q.933 (Annex A) To disable lmi operation, set the value to none(0).

frLmiDceN392.name: frLmiDceN392
frLmiDceN392.description: DCE/UNI error threshold value. Ranges from 1 to 10, with a default value of 9. To configure the value of this variable, LMI type should be configured.

frLmiDceN393.name: frLmiDceN393
frLmiDceN393.description: DCE/UNI monitored events count. Ranges from 1 to 10, with a default value of 10. To configure the value of this variable, LMI type should be configured.

frLmiDteN392.name: frLmiDteN392
frLmiDteN392.description: DTE/UNI error threshold. Ranges from 1 to 10, with a default value of 9. To configure the value of this variable, LMI type should be configured.

frLmiDteN393.name: frLmiDteN393
frLmiDteN393.description: DTE/UNI monitored events count. Ranges from 1 to 10, with a default value of 10. To configure the value of this variable, LMI type should be configured.

frLmiDteN391.name: frLmiDteN391
frLmiDteN391.description: DTE/UNI full status polling interval. Ranges from 1 to 255, with a default value of 6. To configure the value of this variable, LMI type should be configured.

frLmiKeepalive.name: frLmiKeepalive
frLmiKeepalive.description: Local management interface keepalive polling interval time in seconds. The value for this ranges from 5 seconds to 255 seconds with a default value of 10 seconds. To configure the value of this variable, LMI type should be configured.

mfrAckMsgTimer.name: mfrAckMsgTimer
mfrAckMsgTimer.description: The time to wait for an ADD_LINK_ACK message before timing out.

mfrAckMsgMaxRetry.name: mfrAckMsgMaxRetry
mfrAckMsgMaxRetry.description: Maximum number of Retries for the Ack Msg. This variable can be set on a multilink bundle.

mfrClass.name: mfrClass
mfrClass.description: classA -- bundle is UP when 1 link is UP classB -- bundle is UP when all links are UP classC -- bundle is UP when user-specific # of links are UP. In the case of classC, mfrClassThreshold should be configured with mfrClass in an atomic set operation. This variable can be set on a multilink bundle but not on a uni link bundle.

mfrClassThreshold.name: mfrClassThreshold
mfrClassThreshold.description: Threshold - minimum number of links required to activate bundle, for a mfrClass, classC. This variable can be set on a multilink bundle but not on a uni link bundle.

mfrFrameSize.name: mfrFrameSize
mfrFrameSize.description: The frame size for multi-link frame relay. This variable can be set on a multilink bundle but not on a uni link bundle.

mfrHelloTimer.name: mfrHelloTimer
mfrHelloTimer.description: Hello timer in seconds. This variable can be set on a multilink bundle but not on a uni link bundle.

mfrSegThreshold.name: mfrSegThreshold
mfrSegThreshold.description: Segment threshold packet size in bytes. This variable can be set on a multilink bundle but not on a uni link bundle.

mfrDiffDelay.name: mfrDiffDelay
mfrDiffDelay.description: Differential delay in milli seconds. This variable can be set on a multilink bundle but not on a uni link bundle.

frPvcTable.name: frPvcTable
frPvcTable.description: A list of Frame Relay PVC parameters.

frPvcDlci.name: frPvcDlci
frPvcDlci.description: Data Link Connection Identifier of the PVC. The value ranges from 16 to 991. The Dlci is unique for a bundle but Dlci numbers can be reused across bundles.

frPvcEnable.name: frPvcEnable
frPvcEnable.description: Enables PVC for given interface name and DLCI number. By default PVC is disabled. Writing one(1) on this enables PVC.

frPvcIpAddr.name: frPvcIpAddr
frPvcIpAddr.description: IP address to be configured for the PVC. PVC IP subnet Mask variable should also be configured alongwith this variable. A set on this variable will be successful only if the subnetmask is also set in the same request. To unconfigure the Ip address, a set is issued with the value of the ip address as 0.0.0.0

frPvcIpSubnetMask.name: frPvcIpSubnetMask
frPvcIpSubnetMask.description: Subnet mask to be configured alongwith PVC IP address. This variable should be configured alongwith PVC IP address.

frPvcSrcForwardingPrimary.name: frPvcSrcForwardingPrimary
frPvcSrcForwardingPrimary.description: Source forwarding IP address to be configured for PVC. To unconfigure the source forwarding address, a set is issued with the value of the address as 0.0.0.0. This is the primary source forwarding address

frPvcSrcForwardingSecondary.name: frPvcSrcForwardingSecondary
frPvcSrcForwardingSecondary.description: Optional secondary source forwarding address configured for PVC, using alternate ethernet as backup. This variable should be configured along with the PVC primary source forwarding address. To unconfigure the secondary forwarding address, a set is issued with the value of the primary source forwarding address as 0.0.0.0, or a primary source forwarding address is set only, or both primary and secondary are set to 0.0.0.0

frPvcRemoteIpAddr.name: frPvcRemoteIpAddr
frPvcRemoteIpAddr.description: Remote IP address to be mapped for PVC

frPvcPolicingEnable.name: frPvcPolicingEnable
frPvcPolicingEnable.description: This variable is to disable/enable policing for PVC. Writing zero (0) on this disables policing for the PVC. By default policing is enabled.

frPvcPolicingDe.name: frPvcPolicingDe
frPvcPolicingDe.description: If enabled, received frames that exceed policing threshold, will be tagged with DE bit. This variable can be configured only if policing is enabled.

frPvcPolicingCir.name: frPvcPolicingCir
frPvcPolicingCir.description: Committed Information Rate( bits per second ) in receive direction for PVC. This variable can be configured only if policing is enabled.

frPvcPolicingBc.name: frPvcPolicingBc
frPvcPolicingBc.description: Committed Burst ( bits ) in receive direction for PVC. This variable can be configured only if policing is enabled.

frPvcPolicingBe.name: frPvcPolicingBe
frPvcPolicingBe.description: Excess burst ( bits ) in receive direction for PVC. This variable can be configured only if policing enabled.

frPvcShapingCir.name: frPvcShapingCir
frPvcShapingCir.description: The committed information rate (in bits per second) to be configured for the PVC.

frPvcShapingBcMax.name: frPvcShapingBcMax
frPvcShapingBcMax.description: The maximum committed burst (bits) to be configured for the PVC.

frPvcShapingBcMin.name: frPvcShapingBcMin
frPvcShapingBcMin.description: The minimum committed burst (bits) to be configured for the PVC.

frPvcShapingBe.name: frPvcShapingBe
frPvcShapingBe.description: The excess burst (bits) to be configured for the PVC.

frPvcDlciForSwitching.name: frPvcDlciForSwitching
frPvcDlciForSwitching.description: Data Link Connection Identifier of the PVC. The value for this variable ranges from 16 to 991. frPvcBundleNameForSwitching should be set with frPvcDlciForSwitching as an atomic set.

frPvcBundleNameForSwitching.name: frPvcBundleNameForSwitching
frPvcBundleNameForSwitching.description: The name of the bundle configured for Switching.

frPvcRowStatus.name: frPvcRowStatus
frPvcRowStatus.description: To create a row set row status to a value CreateAndGo(4), indexed by bundle Id and the desired dlci number.

frStatsTable.name: frStatsTable
frStatsTable.description: The statistics objects for a frame-relay interface.

frStatsFECNsRx.name: frStatsFECNsRx
frStatsFECNsRx.description: Number of frames received with FECN bit on

frStatsBECNsRx.name: frStatsBECNsRx
frStatsBECNsRx.description: Number of frames received with BECN bit on.

frStatsInvDLCIsRx.name: frStatsInvDLCIsRx
frStatsInvDLCIsRx.description: Number of frames with invalid dlci received

frStatsUnknownDLCIsRx.name: frStatsUnknownDLCIsRx
frStatsUnknownDLCIsRx.description: Number of frames with unknown dlci received

frPvcStatsTableEntry.name: frPvcStatsTableEntry
frPvcStatsTableEntry.description: An entry in the FrPvcStats Table

frPvcStatsBytesRxLastBootOrClear.name: frPvcStatsBytesRxLastBootOrClear
frPvcStatsBytesRxLastBootOrClear.description: Number of bytes received on a pvc since boot or last statistics clear.

frPvcStatsBytesTxLastBootOrClear.name: frPvcStatsBytesTxLastBootOrClear
frPvcStatsBytesTxLastBootOrClear.description: Number of bytes transmitted on a pvc since boot or last statistics clear.

frPvcStatsPktsRxLastBootOrClear.name: frPvcStatsPktsRxLastBootOrClear
frPvcStatsPktsRxLastBootOrClear.description: Number of packets received since boot or last statistics clear.

frPvcStatsPktsTxLastBootOrClear.name: frPvcStatsPktsTxLastBootOrClear
frPvcStatsPktsTxLastBootOrClear.description: Number of packets transmitted since boot or last statistics clear.

frPvcStatsErrPktsRxLastBootOrClear.name: frPvcStatsErrPktsRxLastBootOrClear
frPvcStatsErrPktsRxLastBootOrClear.description: Number of errored packets received since boot or last statistics clear.

frPvcStatsUpDownStatesLastBootOrClear.name: frPvcStatsUpDownStatesLastBootOrClear
frPvcStatsUpDownStatesLastBootOrClear.description: Number of times state(up or down) of the pvc changed in since boot or last statistics clear.

frPvcStatsBytesRxLastFiveMins.name: frPvcStatsBytesRxLastFiveMins
frPvcStatsBytesRxLastFiveMins.description: Number of bytes received in the last five minutes.

frPvcStatsBytesTxLastFiveMins.name: frPvcStatsBytesTxLastFiveMins
frPvcStatsBytesTxLastFiveMins.description: Number of bytes transmitted in the last five minutes.

frPvcStatsPktsRxLastFiveMins.name: frPvcStatsPktsRxLastFiveMins
frPvcStatsPktsRxLastFiveMins.description: Number of packets received in the last five minutes.

frPvcStatsPktsTxLastFiveMins.name: frPvcStatsPktsTxLastFiveMins
frPvcStatsPktsTxLastFiveMins.description: Number of packets transmitted in the last five minutes.

frPvcStatsErrPktsRxLastFiveMins.name: frPvcStatsErrPktsRxLastFiveMins
frPvcStatsErrPktsRxLastFiveMins.description: Number of errored packets received in the last five minutes.

frPvcStatsUpDownStatesLastFiveMins.name: frPvcStatsUpDownStatesLastFiveMins
frPvcStatsUpDownStatesLastFiveMins.description: Number of times state(up or down) of the pvc changed in the last five minutes.

frAvcTable.name: frAvcTable
frAvcTable.description: End-to-End MFR avc parameters are defined in this table.

frAvcTableEntry.name: frAvcTableEntry
frAvcTableEntry.description: avc parameter entries are listed in this table.

frAvcId.name: frAvcId
frAvcId.description: frAvcId is the identifier of an avc. To configure an avc, this parameter must be used as the index. This is assigned internally by the Tiara system. Whenever a row creation needs to occur in the avcTable, the frAvcId is entered as 65535.

frAvcDlci.name: frAvcDlci
frAvcDlci.description: Data Link Connection Identifier of the avc. The value ranges from 16 to 1022. This number is unique across all the avcs created. Once set during creation, it can't be changed.

frAvcName.name: frAvcName
frAvcName.description: Name of the avc. To configure an avc, this parameter must be set. That is, a descriptive name should be given to an avc. The maximum length of an avc name is 8 characters. This parameter is set once during the creation of an avc. an avc can not be renamed.

frAvcDescr.name: frAvcDescr
frAvcDescr.description: Brief description of the avc. The maximum length of this parameter is 25 characters.

frAvcIpAddr.name: frAvcIpAddr
frAvcIpAddr.description: The avc's source IP address. This is one of the parameters required to set up IP multiplexing for an avc. Also the parameters avcIpAddr and avcSubnetMask have to be set together during the same request. To unconfigure the IP address, a set operation is performed with the value 0.0.0.0

frAvcIpSubnetMask.name: frAvcIpSubnetMask
frAvcIpSubnetMask.description: This parameter represents the source subnet mask address. This is one of the parameters required to set up IP multiplexing for a avc. This parameter is set along with the avcIpAddr parameter during the same request.

frAvcSrcForwardingPrimary.name: frAvcSrcForwardingPrimary
frAvcSrcForwardingPrimary.description: The avc's destination IP address. This is one of the parameters required to set up IP multiplexing for an avc. This parameter can be configured when the avc has been configured for IP multiplexing. To unconfigure the source forwarding address, a set operation is performed with the value 0.0.0.0. This is the primary source forwarding address

frAvcSrcForwardingSecondary.name: frAvcSrcForwardingSecondary
frAvcSrcForwardingSecondary.description: The avc's secondary or backup destination address. This address will be used only if the primary address uses an ethernet interface and failover is enabled on that interface and the interface goes down. The secondary source forwarding address is an optional parameter, it should be a gateway on the alternate ethernet This parameter is set along with the primary source forwarding address parameter. To unconfigure this parameter a set operation is performed with the value 0.0.0.0 for the primary address, or a primary address is set with no secondary, or both primary and secondary are set to 0.0.0.0

frAvcRemoteIpAddr.name: frAvcRemoteIpAddr
frAvcRemoteIpAddr.description: Remote IP address to be mapped for the avc. If configured, the arp table is updated with this static entry and inverse arp request packets are no longer sent for this interface.To unconfigure this parameter, a set operation is performed with the value 0.0.0.0 .

frAvcClass.name: frAvcClass
frAvcClass.description: classA -- avc is UP when at least 1 cvc is UP classB -- avc is UP when all cvcs are UP classC -- avc is UP when user-specified # of cvcs are UP classD -- avc is UP when user-specified min. CIR of each cvc is met classE -- avc is UP when user-specified min. CIR of the avc is met In the case of classC/D/E, frAvcClassThreshold should be configured along with avcClass in an atomic set operation.

frAvcClassThreshold.name: frAvcClassThreshold
frAvcClassThreshold.description: Threshold - minimum number of links required to activate bundle, for the avcClass 'classC'. For 'classD' or 'classE', the value will be in bits per second. For 'classA' and 'classB', this value will hold no significance.

frAvcFragmentSize.name: frAvcFragmentSize
frAvcFragmentSize.description: The frame size for multi-link frame relay End-to-End avc in bytes. This value defines the maximum size of any fragment that can be transmitted on any cvc. Frames larger than this size must be fragmented.

frAvcSegThreshold.name: frAvcSegThreshold
frAvcSegThreshold.description: Segment threshold packet size in bytes. This value defines the minimum size of any fragment that can be transmitted on any cvc. Frames smaller than this size must not be fragmented.

frAvcSequence.name: frAvcSequence
frAvcSequence.description: multilink frame relay sequence number length (short = 12 bits ; long = 24 bits.24 bit sequence space increases MFR header by 2 more bytes, but in those situations where the differential delay is high ( > 50 ms ), larger sequence numbers help reduce packet drops that can happen when short sequence numbers complete a cycle quickly.

frAvcNoOfCvcs.name: frAvcNoOfCvcs
frAvcNoOfCvcs.description: Indicates the number of links configured in the avc.

frAvcTotalBw.name: frAvcTotalBw
frAvcTotalBw.description: Indicates the total bandwidth for this avc. The avc bandwidth is the aggregated band- widths of all the links assigned to a particular avc.

frAvcRowStatus.name: frAvcRowStatus
frAvcRowStatus.description: frAvcRowStatus is used to add/delete a row in the table. Adding or deleting a row corresponds to creating an avc or deleting an avc. In order to add a row to the avc table, a set on this parameter should be done with the value 4 (createAndGo) and frAvcId parameter set with the value of 65535. A request to create a row can be completed successfully only if a set on the avcRowStatus and a set on the avcName come in the same request. To delete a row this parameter has to be set with the value 6 (destroy).

frCvcTable.name: frCvcTable
frCvcTable.description: End-to-End MFR cvc parameters are defined in this table.

frCvcTableEntry.name: frCvcTableEntry
frCvcTableEntry.description: cvc parameter entries are listed in this table.

frCvcDlci.name: frCvcDlci
frCvcDlci.description: Data Link Connection Identifier of the cvc. For End-to-End MFR avc, to assign a Constituent Virtual Circuit for aggregation, this CVC dlci is used in conjunction with the cvcBundleName as an atomic set.

frCvcBundleName.name: frCvcBundleName
frCvcBundleName.description: The name of the bundle of the CVC which needs to be added to the avc. This parameter is used in confunction with the frCvcDlci parameter as one atomic set operation.

frAvcStatsTable.name: frAvcStatsTable
frAvcStatsTable.description: The statistics objects for a frame-relay interface.

frAvcStatsBytesRxLastBootOrClear.name: frAvcStatsBytesRxLastBootOrClear
frAvcStatsBytesRxLastBootOrClear.description: Number of bytes received on an avc since boot or last statistics clear.

frAvcStatsBytesTxLastBootOrClear.name: frAvcStatsBytesTxLastBootOrClear
frAvcStatsBytesTxLastBootOrClear.description: Number of bytes transmitted on an avc since boot or last statistics clear.

frAvcStatsPktsRxLastBootOrClear.name: frAvcStatsPktsRxLastBootOrClear
frAvcStatsPktsRxLastBootOrClear.description: Number of packets received since boot or last statistics clear.

frAvcStatsPktsTxLastBootOrClear.name: frAvcStatsPktsTxLastBootOrClear
frAvcStatsPktsTxLastBootOrClear.description: Number of packets transmitted since boot or last statistics clear.

frAvcStatsErrPktsRxLastBootOrClear.name: frAvcStatsErrPktsRxLastBootOrClear
frAvcStatsErrPktsRxLastBootOrClear.description: Number of errored packets received since boot or last statistics clear.

frAvcStatsUpDownStatesLastBootOrClear.name: frAvcStatsUpDownStatesLastBootOrClear
frAvcStatsUpDownStatesLastBootOrClear.description: Number of times state(up or down) of the avc changed in since boot or last statistics clear.

frAvcStatsBytesRxLastFiveMins.name: frAvcStatsBytesRxLastFiveMins
frAvcStatsBytesRxLastFiveMins.description: Number of bytes received in the last five minutes.

frAvcStatsBytesTxLastFiveMins.name: frAvcStatsBytesTxLastFiveMins
frAvcStatsBytesTxLastFiveMins.description: Number of bytes transmitted in the last five minutes.

frAvcStatsPktsRxLastFiveMins.name: frAvcStatsPktsRxLastFiveMins
frAvcStatsPktsRxLastFiveMins.description: Number of packets received in the last five minutes.

frAvcStatsPktsTxLastFiveMins.name: frAvcStatsPktsTxLastFiveMins
frAvcStatsPktsTxLastFiveMins.description: Number of packets transmitted in the last five minutes.

frAvcStatsErrPktsRxLastFiveMins.name: frAvcStatsErrPktsRxLastFiveMins
frAvcStatsErrPktsRxLastFiveMins.description: Number of errored packets received in the last five minutes.

frAvcStatsUpDownStatesLastFiveMins.name: frAvcStatsUpDownStatesLastFiveMins
frAvcStatsUpDownStatesLastFiveMins.description: Number of times state(up or down) of the avc changed in the last five minutes.
